Key Match Events: Ivan Toney scored a penalty in the 17th minute.
Jude Bellingham scored in the 90+5th minute.
Joe Gomez scored in the 67th minute.
James Maddison scored in the 90+1st minute.
Youri Tielemans scored in the 11th and 36th minutes.
Michy Batshuayi scored in the 90+5th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a tight match with a possible draw.
England was missing key players Harry Kane and Bukayo Saka.
Belgium was without Romelu Lukaku and Kevin De Bruyne.
Belgium had a 12-game unbeaten run heading into the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate reflected on the positives despite the lack of cutting edge.
Southgate's men avoided a second successive home friendly defeat.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kyle Walker withdrew from the squad due to a hamstring problem.
Harry Maguire and Sam Johnstone also withdrew due to injuries.
Rico Lewis and James Trafford were promoted to the first team.
Romelu Lukaku was expected to return for the match against England.
